NumberTheory_KG.description: This KG provides number-theoretic reasoning including prime testing, GCD, LCM, and advanced operations for IMO-level challenges.

agents.name: PrimeTestAgent
agents.description: Tests if a given number is prime.
agents.groovyScript: class PrimeTestAgent { def generateCandidate(n) { for(int i = 2; i < n; i++) { if(n % i == 0) return false; } return true; } }
